amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Transportation must consider the impact on northern Delaware of aircraft noise related to the Philadelphia International Airport Capacity Enhancement Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1948 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1948 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Carper. (consideration: CR S13120; text: CR S13120) To express the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Transportation must consider the impact on northern Delaware of aircraft noise related to the Philadelphia International Airport Capacity Enhancement Program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1948 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Carper.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1948 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
